131173.タロット『<%sB_TAROT_ARCA>の<%sB_TAROT_MONS>』は:
"<%sB_TAROT_ARCA> <%sB_TAROT_MONS>" is a Tarot
in a deck. Are you sure you want to use it as
material?
<yesno 2><close>

131174.その タロット『<%sB_TAROT_ARCA>の<%sB_TAROT_MONS:

material!<end>

131176.材料にするタロットを ２枚 選んでください。\n<end>:
Please choose 2 Tarots to use as
materials.<end>

131191.<color_yellow>\nタロット合成の 説明です！\n<br>\nタロッ:
This will explain Tarot Synthesis!
Using the Tarot Table, you can synthesize 2 Monster Tarots together in order to create a new Tarot.
The new Tarot will inherit the Arcana and monster type of the Tarots used as material.
Please choose 2 Tarots to use as materials.

145069.タロットテーブルは\n不思議な光を たたえている……。\n<br>\n<colo:
The Tarot Table is casting forth a mysterious light...
This Tarot Table can be used to synthesize 2 Tarots together or change a Tarot's Arcana.
Before you can use it, you must be a Fortune Teller of at least level 40 and speak with Tarot Shop Babilo.

145070.タロットを ２枚以上所持していないため\n合成できません。タロット合成をするには:
You must have have at least 2 Tarots in your
possession to perform synthesis.<end>

145071.材料にできる タロットが\nなくなりました。\n<end>: You don't have any more Tarots to use.<end>

146754.ランクが ＳＳ以上のタロットです。\n合成の材料に使って\n本当に よろしいです:
Are you sure you'd like to use an SS+ Rank
Tarot as a material for synthesis?<yesno 2><close>

150143.タロットが これ以上 少なくなると\nデッキを組むことが できなくなります。\n:
If you use too many Tarots in synthesis, you
won't have enough to build a deck to use in
battle. Proceed anyways?<yesno 2><close>

279386.<color_yellow>\nタロットテーブルで 新たに アルカナを\n替える:
The Tarot Table now offers a new function to change the Arcana of your Tarots.
By using "Change Arcana", you can change the Arcana that any of your owned Tarots is currently using.
This process doesn't consume any of your Tarots, so feel free to give it a try!

279387.タロットテーブルでは タロット合成と\nアルカナを替えることが できます。\nど:
At a Tarot Table, you can perform synthesis
or change a Tarot's Arcana. What do you want
to do?<break>

279388.<select_se_off>\nタロット合成\nアルカナを替える\nデッキの編:
<select_se_off>
Tarot Synthesis
Change Arcana
Organize Deck
View Tarots
View Book
<select_end>
<break>
